cause.description:
People should not use mood and/or mind altering chemicals! This community is created to help people in the world stop using drugs and to quit smoking. Also remember, alcohol is a drug!
1. Drugs are harmful and will lead to death! People should abstain from ALL drugs!
2. People should also abstain from prescription drugs!
3. People should abstain from methadone and other types of drug-replacement therapies!
4. Alcohol IS a drug!
5. People should abstain from smoking! Smoking will cause cancer and death!
cause.mission: The mission of this cause is to help people who wants to stop using drugs and to quit smoking!
cause.name: 100% Drug Free
